name.baseName: 牛肉生产 ; 肉牛生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The size of the beef cattle farm is generally about 1000, the weight of the shelf cattle is generally 350~400kg, the fattening period is generally three to four months, and the weight is 500~550kg when it comes out
规模肉牛养殖场存栏量一般在 1000 头左右，架子牛体重一般为 350~400kg， 育肥期一般在三到四个月，出栏时体重在 500~550kg

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 1kg of beef is a functional unit (FU), and the system boundaries of beef production include fertilizer production, feed crop (wheat, corn, soybean) cultivation, and beef cattle feeding stage.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average body weight of beef cattle was 500kg, and each beef cattle drank 20~30kg of water every day, with an average of 25kg. The meat yield was about 48% of body weight.
作者对甘肃省张掖市前进牧业石岗墩牧场调查得到出栏肉牛的出栏平均体 重为 500kg，每头肉牛平均每天饮水 20~30kg，取平均值 25kg，出肉率为体重的 48%左右。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: LCA was used to evaluate the four livestock products, and to evaluate the resource consumption, product input and environmental emissions in the whole process from raw material production to final product production. The four livestock products were evaluated in the same evaluation model, and the impact degree of a certain type of environmental impact and its comprehensive impact on the environment were qualitatively and quantitatively assessed. Finally, the environmental impact indicators of producing 1kg beef, 1kg milk, 1kg pork and 1kg chicken eggs were obtained respectively. Through analyzing and comparing the environmental load of the production of four kinds of livestock products, suggestions were provided for the adjustment of the breeding structure of China's livestock industry and the production structure of livestock products. And through the field research of advancing animal husbandry in Zhangye City, learning from the development model of advancing animal husbandry cooperative, the development model of grassland agriculture in China was discussed.

通过 LCA 评价这四种畜产品，从原材料生产到最终产品产 出全过程的各种资源消耗、产品投入、环境排放，在同一种评价模型中评价四种 畜产品，定性、定量地评估单位畜产品生产对某一环境影响类型的影响程度、以 及对环境综合影响，最终分别得到生产 1kg 牛肉、1kg 牛奶、1kg 猪肉、1kg 鸡 蛋对环境的影响指标，通过分析比较四种畜产品生产对环境的负荷，为我国畜牧 业养殖结构和畜产品生产结构调整提供建议。并且通过在张掖市前进牧业实地调 研，借鉴前进牧业合作社发展模式，探讨我国草地农业发展模式。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process of beef cattle production typically involves large-scale operations with an average farm size housing approximately 1000 beef cattle. The cattle, which are generally raised on a shelf system, weight about 350 to 400 kg at the onset of the fattening period, which lasts for three to four months. By the time of market delivery, these shelf cattle have an average weight of 500 to 550 kg. This type of beef production is commonly utilized for commercial meat distribution, supplying beef to both local and larger-scale markets.
牛肉生产工业流程通常涉及大规模操作，平均养牛场规模约1000头牛。这些肉牛通常在架子系统上饲养，育肥期开始时体重大约为350至400公斤，育肥期持续三到四个月。到出售市场时，这些架子牛平均体重为500至550公斤。这种类型的牛肉生产通常用于商业性肉类分销，为当地和更大规模市场供应牛肉。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: 作者对甘肃省张掖市前进牧业石岗墩牧场调查得到出栏肉牛的出栏平均体 重为 500kg，每头肉牛平均每天饮水 20~30kg，取平均值 25kg，出肉率为体重的 48%左右。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 魏云. 基于生命周期评价的禽畜产品环境影响评价及对策探讨. (兰州大学, 2016).
魏云. 基于生命周期评价的禽畜产品环境影响评价及对策探讨. (兰州大学, 2016).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this set of LCA data for beef production, please consider the specific context of the advanced beef cattle production at the Zhangye Stony Dun Ranch in the Gansu Province. The functional unit is defined as 1 kg of beef, and the system boundary encompasses fertilizer production, the cultivation of feed crops such as wheat, corn, and soybeans, and the beef cattle feeding stage. The average daily water usage per cattle, as well as the expected meat yield, should be taken into account, with 25 kg for water consumption and a 48% yield based on the cattle's body weight. It is advisable to incorporate these details during the life cycle impact assessment to ensure a comprehensive analysis of the environmental impact of the specified beef production process.
在使用这份牛肉生产的生命周期评估（LCA）数据时，请考虑甘肃省张掖市石岗墩牧场先进肉牛生产的具体情境。功能单位定义为1千克牛肉，系统边界包括化肥生产、种植饲料作物（如小麦、玉米和大豆）以及肉牛喂养阶段。应该考虑每头牛的平均日水耗，以及预期的出肉率，具体为每天水消耗25千克和基于牛体重的48%出肉率。建议在生命周期影响评估中纳入这些细节，确保对指定牛肉生产过程的环境影响进行全面分析。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
